mapper.insert: insert into users(email, phone_number, user_name, password, birth, myself_memo, profile_img_url) values (#{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{birthDate}, #{introduce}, #{profileImgUrl})
mapper.select: select user_id as userId, email, user_name as userName, phone_number as phoneNumber, myself_memo as introduction, profile_img_url as profileImgUrl from users where user_id = #{userId}
select EMAIL from USERS where EMAIL = #{email}
